de.unistuttgart.vis.wearable.os.utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unistuttgart.vis.wearable.os.utils.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some basic utilities that can be used everywhere.
    Author:
    roehrdor

    • Method Detail

      • sleepUninterrupted

        public static void sleepUninterrupted(int timeInMSecs)
        Sleep for the given amount of time without getting interrupted.
        Parameters:
        timeInMSecs - the time in mseconds to sleep

      • getFloatFromIntByte

        public static float getFloatFromIntByte(int v)

        Convert the given int value into a float value. Note that this function does not cast the value but rather reinterprets the byte representation of the given number and returns the result as floating point value.

        Note that this function is equivalent to the C / C++ code: float r = *(float*)&v;

        Parameters:
        v - the integer that is to be reinterpreted
        Returns:
        the float value for the byte representation of the integer value

      • getIntFromFloatByte

        public static int getIntFromFloatByte(float f)

        Convert the given float value into a int value. Note that this function does not cast the value but rather reinterprets the byte representation of the given float number and returns the result as integer value

        Note that this function is equivalent to the C / C++ code: int r = *(int*)&f;

        Parameters:
        f - the float value that is to be reinterpreted
        Returns:
        the int value for the byte representation of the float value

      • getByteFromFloat

        public static void getByteFromFloat(byte[] b,
                                    float f)
        Convert the given float value to the given byte array
        Parameters:
        b - the byte destination array to store the byte representation fot the float value into
        f - the float value to be stored as byte representation in the byte array

      • getFloatFromByte

        Returns:
        the float number

      • getCurrentLongUnixTimeStamp

        public static long getCurrentLongUnixTimeStamp()
        Get the current unix date with milli seconds. This functions returns the value of the call to the function System.currentTimeMillis()
        Returns:
        the current time in unix time with milli seconds

      • explicitFromImplicit

        public static android.content.Intent explicitFromImplicit(android.content.Context context,
                                                          android.content.Intent implicitIntent)
        This function can be used to create an explicit intent from the given implicit one. Android API 21 needs an explicit Intent to start a service from
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application
        implicitIntent - the implicit created Intent
        Returns:
        the corresponding explicit content for the given implicit one

      • enoughExternalSpaceAvailable

        public static boolean enoughExternalSpaceAvailable(java.io.File path,
                                                   android.content.Context context)
        Checks for free space at the specified directory to give feedback whether an export to that path is possible
        Parameters:
        path - The target directory for the archive
        context - The context of the activity that calls this method
        Returns:
        the possibility to save the sensor archive in the desired directory

      • getAvailableInternalSpace

        public static long getAvailableInternalSpace()
        Checks the free space that is available at the internal storage
        Returns:
        the internal space available for the archive import in byte size
